channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Leaves need clearing from outside pavement and parking area of 1-18 Shaftesbury street n1 7hr, 12th November
item.description:
So many leaves causing accidents, people have slipped over when leaving the block as there are so many leaves

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Shaftesbury Street, Hackney, London

item.title: Huge amount of trash on footpath:against building, 12th November
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): St James's Crescent, Brixton, London

item.title: A faulty street light, it won't stop flashing! Annoying me and other neighbours!, 12th November
item.description:
A street light in our little mews road is flashing incessantly, the flashing light is visible from my lounge, it's just a few feet away, and it is irritating! Other neighbours here are equally annoyed! Please address this immediately.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 9-10, Northwick Close, St. John's Wood, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Full litter bin, 12th November

item.title: Missing 50mph road sign, 12th November
item.description:
The road that leads into Western Way from West Thamesmead doesn’t have a 50mph sign even though the road is 50mph. So joining the road, I would have no way of knowing it was that speed.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Thames Reach, Thamesmead

item.title: Very deep pothole, 12th November
item.description:
This pothole over the bridge was filled not long ago, but there's obviously no support below because the new tarmac has fallen through and opened up a deep large pothole again. It's exactly where your car tyre needs to go. Very dangerous as you need to move into the next lane to avoid it.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Colney Hatch Lane, Colney Hatch, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overflowing bins in the bin store at Hitchcock House, 194 Pitfield Street, 12th November
item.description:
The bins in the store are overflowing due to missed collections over the past few weeks. This happens frequently, and the area around the bins is full of flies.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Pitfield Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Vehicles parked on pavement in Fordmill Rd blocking access to water meters and external stop cocksess to water meter and external stop cock, 12th November
item.description:
Vehicles are parking over Thames Water meter metal grates on pavement blocking access to water meters and external stop. cocks. Metal grates clearly marked Water are being parked pavements outside Block 13 - 18 Huntsworth Court in Fordmill Rd. Huntsworth Court situated on corner of Canadian Ave and Fordmill Rd Catford prohibiting property owners from being to turn off external stop cocks.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Fordmill Road, Southend, London
Report on FixMyStreet
